channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Mysterious lights are messing up the dancing at the firefly prom in 'The Unidentified Shiny Object', and in 'The Case of the Crying Monkey', the duo follows sounds to locate a baby monkey. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Dimwitty and Clumsy get rid of the fire truck in 'Fire Brigade on Foot', then in 'The Prettiest Pebble in the World', Gargamel leaves magic pebbles in the forest to hypnotize the Smurfs. (S4, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora takes a rain cloud to a water slide in 'Partly Claudia', then in 'Ranita's Magic Stripes', Dora helps Ranita earn her magic healing stripes. (S2, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from snowshoeing in 'Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways', then in 'Pups Save a Duck Pond', the water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Yumi's Robo-Corn Plucker goes haywire in 'Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic', then in 'Pups Save a Mascot', Daring Danny X, dressed as a bird mascot, gets carried away by a pair of eagles! (S5, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Speed Meister sabotages the Sierra Sparkle show in 'The Crew Builds A Solar-Powered Bus', then in 'The Crew Builds A Lifeguard Tower', the pups make the beach safe! (S2, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Wild West Heroes: Blaze, AJ, and Starla are on their way to a Wild West Picnic! But when the Lunchbox Bandit steals everyone's lunchboxes, it's up to our Wild West Heroes to get them back! (S7, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Cakey's Cupcake Cousins: It's cousin time. Bakey, Flakey, Marshapan and Paddycake visit Cakey and the dollhouse gang for a sprinkle-rific day of yummy snacks and hug attacks. (S2, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy & Poppy Go Bananas: Granny Thistle comes to visit and gives Daisy and Poppy a powerful magical wand. The children escape from the castle and. go bananas.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Witch: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Stone Age Granny; Trampolines: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig's Birthday; Windmills: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Daring Danny's at it again, this time sinking the Paw Patroller in 'Pups Raise the PAW Patroller', then in 'Pups Save the Crows', Ryder and the Pups pair up with Alex and his mini patrol.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Folk Music Band: Peppa and George are in Granny and Grandpa Pig's Garden. Granny's friends are playing folk music! They play music for Grandpa Pig and then Grandpa Pig makes apple juice for everyone.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Calling Kylie: It is bedtime and Peppa calls Kylie Kangaroo and is surprised to learn it's not morning or winter where she is! Daddy Pig explains this using a big ball to represent the earth.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: House Rules; Big Announcement: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes To School: Naughty Gaston is sent to pet school, where Miss Jolly soon gets him into shape.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Picnic: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Ant Farm: Things are going missing all over the Little Kingdom - Holly has lost her wand and Ben has lost his horn! Soon they realise that ants are stealing their things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Elf Rescue: With so many rescue missions, Elf Rescue needs a helping hand from Children Rescue.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Masks: Madame Gazelle has got another task for the children; making masks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Molly Mole: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Soft Play: It's Richard Rabbit's birthday party and George is invited, and that can only mean one thing; Soft Play.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Market: Peppa and family find some great things to buy from the market and even get a special gift from Mr. Fox's stall.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Eight episodes.

channel.desc: What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington must keep his promise to not make a mess in 'Paddington's Goo Monster', then in 'Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure', Paddington and Simi go on a journey into the human body. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Hum-Mover: Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye: When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington builds a robot in 'Paddington Meets PaddingTron', then in 'Paddington's First Diwali', Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad? (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A runaway train must be stopped in 'Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express', then in 'Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers', Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops. (S8, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The pups are on a mission to save elephants in 'Pups Save Thundermouth', then in 'Pups Save a Class Pet', when the school hamster escapes, it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet. (S7, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora needs to find rainbow water on 'The Alebrije Adventure', then in 'Let's Get A Paleta', on a super-hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Boomer challenges Roxi to a race in 'Pups Save the Risky Race', then in 'Pups Save the Runaway Truck', Boomer is left dangling from a drawbridge as his monster truck goes without a driver. (S11, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Dimwitty and Clumsy get rid of the fire truck in 'Fire Brigade on Foot', then in 'The Prettiest Pebble in the World', Gargamel leaves magic pebbles in the forest to hypnotize the Smurfs. (S4, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Snow Cruise: The Gabby Cats go on a cruise to see Pete the Polar Bear's new rainbow igloo. Along the way, Mercat helps them learn about all kinds of fun things that water does. (S3, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Pit Crew Power: Blaze is racing with AJ and Gabby as his pit crew! But Crusher is also in the race, and he's determined to win. Can Blaze take home the trophy, or will Crusher pit-stop him? (S9, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay in 'Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub', and in 'Pups Save a Drive-In', the pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector. (S10, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Two robots take on more than they can handle in 'Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends', then in 'Pups Save the Rainbow', Mayor Humdinger finds a prism that drains Adventure Bay of colour. (S10, ep5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Made Up Musical Instruments: Madame Gazelle gets the playgroup to play music - with instruments that they must make themselves! (S5, ep 33).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Flying Discs: Mummy and Daddy Pig show Peppa and George how to play Flying Discs in the park. Soon their friends appear with their parents.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Pet: The Twins really want a pet and Nanny Plum sets about getting them one. She magics them up Pippin the hamster. The Wise Old Elf even brings Pippin a hamster wheel.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Pirate Treasure: When Captain Squid leaves his treasure map in the Little Kingdom, Redbeard the Elf Pirate leads Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum on a treasure hunt.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Witch: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The VIP: King Leopold has announced he is paying a visit to The Little Kingdom. Everyone is very excited that they have a VIP coming and prepare to welcome him. But King Thistle is feeling left out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mr Elf Takes a Holiday: Mr Elf is overworked so King Thistle sentences him to a holiday. He isn't too pleased. But Mrs Elf and Ben are overjoyed! Meanwhile, Nanny takes over the food deliveries.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle in 'Pups Save Bedtime', then in 'Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg', Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it rolls away and is heading through town. (S6, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rubble dreams of meeting his alien double in 'Pups Save a Rubble-Double', then in 'Pups Save a Clown', Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's clown car. (S8, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Magical Mermaid-lantis: It's the big Mermaid Sparkle Party in Mermaid-lantis! But when the grumpy Kitty Squiddy tries to ruin the party for everyone, Gabby and Pandy must save the day. (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: There's a game of hide-and-seek in the wetlands in 'The Lost Capybara Kids', then in 'The Case of the Curious Keas', Sam and Kit try to figure out who's playing tricks on them in the snow. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Chef makes some delicious cat food for Azrael in 'Smurfalicious Catfood', and then in 'Waffle Thief', Dwayne loves Lily's waffles and keeps wanting more. (S4, ep 3).

channel.title: PAW Patrol

channel.desc: The pups fix Speed Meister's roller coaster in 'The Crew Builds a Roller Coaster', then in 'The Crew Builds Motor a Play Space', the crew tries to pass inspection. (S2, ep 1).

channel.desc: Cupcake Tree: When the Gabby Cats get stuck in the leaves of an overgrown cupcake tree, it's up to Gabby, Pandy and cupcake-expert Cakey to work together to save CatRat. (S2, ep 12).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office: Mummy and Daddy Pig are working in their home office and Peppa wants to 'work' like them too. Peppa decides that she needs her own office, so she takes the cupboard under the stairs.

channel.desc: Gaston The Ladybird: Holly and Ben think Gaston the Ladybird is sad so they try and cheer him up by tidying his cave. But Gaston liked his cave just as it was - all messy and untidy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Redbeard The Elf Pirate: Barnaby Elf's uncle, Redbeard the Elf Pirate, comes to visit the Little Kingdom, but he has lost his treasure. Everyone must help Redbeard track down the treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Baby Dragon: The children have adopted a new pet - a dragon named Dave.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Farm: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Castle: Mummy and Daddy Pig take Peppa and George to a castle to feast on medieval banquets, play King and Queen and even meet a dragon. It's George's favourite day ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parachute Jump: When the school roof is broken and needs fixing, Peppa volunteers Mummy Pig to do a parachute jump to raise money. Daddy Pig goes up too and has to overcome his fear of heights.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Gerald Giraffe: Gerald Giraffe is new to playgroup! He's trying to make friends with Peppa and the group, but finds being so tall is making playing hide and seek quite a challenge.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit's Taxi: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and the family to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house to drop off their shopping off, but that's not the last trip of the day for her.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington

channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch: Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt. He is harnessed over a canyon eating an extreme lunch when the wind blows him upside down.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.desc: Lucy's Picnic: On a tour of the Elf Factory, the Elf and Fairy children learn about recycling and see how rubbish is re-used. When the factory runs out of material, they set out to find some more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Bunty II: Mr Elf has built a new boat to replace the one Big Bad Barry ate. He is nervous when the king commands him to take them on a cruise to a tropical paradise - will Big Bad Barry strike again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Honey Bees: Ben and Holly visit the bee hive to see how honey is made. Wise Old Elf is the bee keeper and he proceeds to show the children his special way of collecting honey.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Yumi's bees go missing from her farm in 'Pups Save the Honey', and in 'Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse', Mayor Goodway's purse disappears along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta! (S6, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons in 'Pups Save a Sweet Mayor', then in 'Pups Save a Magic Trick', the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies. (S8, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Snow Cruise: The Gabby Cats go on a cruise to see Pete the Polar Bear's new rainbow igloo. Along the way, Mercat helps them learn about all kinds of fun things that water does. (S3, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Babysitting; Work and Play: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Whistling; Horsey Twinkle Toes: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: London; George's Wooly Hat: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny and Grandpa's Attic: Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player, along with some very funny old records.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Children's Fete: The school roof has a leak, again! The children organise a fete to raise money for a new roof.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit track a legendary creature in 'The Legend of the Night Howler', then in 'The Haystack Stakeout', who would steal a cute forest pika's dry flower pile? (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Meteorite finds a night club in the forest in 'Disco Smurf', then in 'Dwayne's New Toy', Diaper Daddy is looking for a more loving family after being betrayed by Handy. (S4, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora's family makes a pinata for Mami that flies away in 'A Pinata For Mami', then in 'Invisi-Swiper', Swiper swipes an invisibility blanket. (S2, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelette in 'Pups Save a Hatchling', then in 'Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand', Traveling Travis volunteers to watch the farm. (S9, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Daring Danny X is at it again in 'Pups Bear-ly Save Danny', then in 'Pups Save the Mayor's Tulips', Mayor Humdinger sabotages Mayor Goodway's perfect petals for the tulip contest.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups build a new sport of Bunny Ball in 'The Crew Builds a Mini Golf Course', then in 'The Crew Builds a Butterfly Garden', Motor finds a special blue butterfly. (S2, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Ice Treasure: After discovering an ice road that leads to a giant ice treasure, Blaze, AJ, Watts and Gabby go an adventure to find out what's inside! (S7, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: DJ's Glow Ride: Gabby receives a glow-in-the-dark train, but its cars are missing. With help from DJ Catnip, the Gabby Cats build the remaining cars. (S1, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Bunty II: Mr Elf has built a new boat to replace the one Big Bad Barry ate. He is nervous when the king commands him to take them on a cruise to a tropical paradise - will Big Bad Barry strike again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Fire Station Practice; Guinea Pigs: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Swimming Lesson; Peppa's Diary: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: In The Future; Kiddie Workout: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Pizza! Pizza!; The Sandcastle: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rubble's cousin visits Adventure Bay in 'Charger Visits the Pups', and then in 'Pups Save a Shiny Ride', Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a contest. (S9, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool! (S7, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works. (S7, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden; Moving In: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes to the Vet: Ben Elf and his parents are going on holiday in the elf truck but Gaston the Ladybird has swallowed the car keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dolly Plum: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.
